positive_examples: My decision here is guided by my spiritual beliefs.
Prayer/meditation led me to this understanding.
My faith tradition shapes how I see this issue.
I feel spiritually called to respond this way.
The sacred texts guide my thinking on this.
negative_examples: Let me analyze this based on the practical considerations.
The evidence points in this direction.
Logical reasoning leads to this conclusion.
The best approach here considers multiple factors.
Let me think through this systematically.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects spiritual beliefs shaping reasoning versus secular analysis. Key markers: guided by faith, spiritually called, sacred texts, prayer led me.

definition: A signal indicating when spiritual beliefs are shaping thoughts, decisions, or behaviors.
